story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_0100:
Good job, everyone. I’m just glad you all got
back safely!
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_0300:
I thought he’d learned his lesson after what
happened in Johto, but he hasn’t changed a bit!
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_0400:
I suppose. But with this incident, Team Rocket has
taken a fairly big blow.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_0500:
After trying so hard to take over Pasio and failing,
they’ll probably want to lie low for a while.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_0600: It would be great if it turned out to be that simple.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_0900:
Next time, I’m going to make sure I’ve obtained
real strength.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_1000:
I’ll be strong enough to fight my battles on
my own.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_1100:
So you’d better be ready, Ethan...because I’ll be
taking you down first.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_1300: What did you expect? We’re rivals, aren’t we?
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_1600:
I, uh...hope this means I’ve gotten a little closer
with Silver.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_1700:
Oh, come on! You’ve been getting along fine for
a while now!
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_1800:
There isn’t just one way to be friends with
someone, y’know.
story_teamrocket_03_10000/2401_1001_1900: Being rivals is really great, too!
